data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 6,926 believers in La Estrelleta that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of La Estrelleta, Dominican Republic
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, help the stressed and anxious in La Estrelleta, Dominican Republic know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

data.section_summary: On average, 11 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in La Estrelleta, Dominican Republic.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of La Estrelleta, Dominican Republic who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 6,926 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Japanese people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Spirit, train the church of La Estrelleta, Dominican Republic to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in La Estrelleta who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in La Estrelleta, Dominican Republic and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

location.name: La Estrelleta
location.cities_list: Comendador, Hondo Valle, El Llano, Juan Santiago, Río Limpio
location.cities_list_w_pop: Comendador (12,070), Hondo Valle (3,713), El Llano (2,438), Juan Santiago (1,549), Río Limpio (1,376)
